projectList.title: Bubble League
projectList.group: Triangle Interactive Arts Council - Global Game Jam 2025
projectList.description: Helped develop bubble league as a Jam game for the Global Game Jam 2025. Helped work on many of the physics and core game systems. It's a super fun local coop game, you should try it if you get a chance.

projectList.title: RevvEngine
projectList.description: A work in progress 3D racing game engine that I am using to document and show off my process learning the OpenGL 4.6 API. Right now I am working purely on the 3D asset import to rendering pipeline. I have plans to create an editor and possibly integrate a game logic scripting system much later on.
